title: Q&A with Federico Bedeschi - World Grain
summary: Bedeschi, a family-owned Italian manufacturing company specializing in grain handling and storage equipment, has a long history of innovation and sustainability.  The company offers solutions to reduce dust emissions and energy consumption in the grain industry, including enclosed systems, eco hoppers with dedusting systems, and chain ship unloaders.  Bedeschi is expanding its global presence with new offices in Australia and Germany, driven by the demand for experienced engineers and a strategic commitment to growth in key markets.
product_or_process: eco hoppers with dedusting systems, enclosed systems, chain ship unloaders
likely_naics_codes: ['333914 - Industrial and Commercial Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing', '333299 - Other Fabricated Metal Product Manufacturing', '423820 - Merchant Wholesalers, Nondurable Goods', '423830 - Merchant Wholesalers, Durable Goods']
greenwashing: The article does not describe any instances of greenwashing, and instead highlights Bedeschi's commitment to sustainability and environmentally conscious solutions.
